runs.comm: nice start outside off stump, Smith gives himself the luxury of a leave...decent carry through to Prior
slightly fuller and a firm drive from Smith picks out mid off
too wide this time and that's the first run of the day
driven firmly into the off side, not timed by Smith but far enough to the right of Pietersen at mid off to get a single
outside off and Bosman also starts his innings with a leave alone
on off stump, defended towards mid on...tight line from Anderson
first bouncer of the day, Bosman thinks of having a hook but pulls out as the ball loops over his shoulder
dragged down short first up and Smith latches onto a pull which sends the ball whistling through square leg for the first boundary
better line from Bresnan, tucks Smith up on middle stump and the captain takes it on the body
another short ball which Smith hooks down towards fine leg, Bresnan got away with that
flash and a miss outside off as he goes for a powerful cut, good bouncer off a length took that over the top edge
taken on the pad as he aims through the leg side, appeal from Bresnan but that was never out...heading miles over the stumps
worked into the leg side in front of mid on...Bresnan came back well after that early boundary
first piece of aggression from Bosman, picks this up from a good length and whips it over square leg
much fuller and outside off, powerful drive towards mid off but not timed
pulled through square leg again as Anderson gets a little too straight
backs away to the leg side very early and pulls strongly but straight to midwicket...Smith was on the move before Anderson was up to the crease
more shuffling in his stance from Smith, drives powerfully but again straight to the fielder at mid off...just not finding the gaps
misses out on a pull and is taken on the body
a good length ball is swung over midwicket...quite an ugly shot, but perfectly effective in this format
width outside off this time and flayed dismissively through the covers...that one came out of the middle
three in a row, and it's a no-ball to boot, as Smith gets right underneath this one and sends it miles into the air. The ball lands just in front of the deep midwicket rope
bowled him, he gets it straight and Smith misses a wild swing across the line but he had the freedom to do as he pleased. A few people got very excited by that
full on off stump, driven square on the off side and well fielded at backward point
low full toss, a slower ball, which is dug out down to mid off
oh dear, oh dear, oh dear...another no-ball from Mahmood and it's drilled straight to mid off. The fielders start to celebrate before seeing the umpire's arm
and this one goes all the way over midwicket...dropped in short and Bosman latches.
wrong line on leg stump but he gets away with it as Smith picks out square leg
very full outside off, Smith does well to drive it square through backward point with enough power to beat the deep sweeper
thumped straight down the ground this time, closes the face as he drives and there's no chance for mid off
he's finding the middle regularly now, but this time it goes almost straight to deep cover
one of Bosman's favourite strokes, picked up over deep square-leg (where Wright makes a great attempt to catch it) but the bowler pays for being too short again
goes full on the stumps and it's dug out through square leg
guess what? It's short. Guess what? It gets dispatched miles over the deep midwicket boundary. England's bowlers not learning
better, at least it's full at the stumps, swung to midwicket for a scampered single
jeepers, there's six more. A horrible full toss which Smith heaves mightily over mid on...England have lost control
would you believe it, third man comes up and Smith gets an outside edge past the keeper down to the boundary
dropped by Wright in his follow through, Smith drives and it flies back at the bowler who can't cling on...it nearly took Wright's head off
finally a good yorker which Bosman can't get further than the bowler
dropped square on the off side, it's a single which counts as a success for England
heaved off the inside edge down to fine leg
straight full toss, worked through square leg
slower-ball bouncer, a brave attempt from Mahmood, and the lack of pace does for Bosman who is through his shot far too early
crunching straight drive over mid off who is inside the circle, one bounce over the boundary
wow, that's huge, he picks up a good length ball from outside off and sends it miles over midwicket towards the electronic scoreboard
flat six, take that, slog-sweep goes skimming above the outfield straight into the boundary hoardings
that's bigger, that's harder, and it's over midwicket again...Smith reaches fifty from 25 balls. A cracking innings, he's flying
quicker ball outside off, Smith misses his attempted dab and Prior whips off the bails. Third umpire takes a look but Smith did well to keep his foot behind the line
short outside off, cut away to deep cover
long hop, rubbish ball, and the wagon wheel gets another line towards midwicket and that's three maximums in the cover
make that four in the over, this one's gone straight over long on and it's hard to know what else to say
what a victory, it's a dot ball as Smith drives and misses outside off
heaved down to long leg
big appeal from Wright, Bosman gets taken on the boot by a full ball and it certainly looked close...maybe drifting down leg
another edge to third man, expansive drive from Smith and eludes the out-stretched Matt Prior
driven straight out to deep cover
driven neatly down to long off and good running brings him back for a second...that's his fifty from 25 balls, another cracking innings from him
good length, picked up of deep midwicket for another massive six (sorry if it all sounds a little repetitive!)
this one is longer and straighter over mid on...six number 11 of the innings and we aren't even halfway
blimey, a dot ball
driven down to long off all along the ground
backs away to the leg side and swings hard, doesn't come out of the middle and goes one bounce to long on
full on leg stump, worked out to deep midwicket
inside edge into his boot, nearly bowls him but it bobbles into the off side
bit of a shambles there...a decent yorker is dug out to cover who prevents a single, but then gives one away by hurling an overthrow past the stumps
low full toss swung hard through the leg side, Morgan at deep square-leg scoots around to cut it off
another low full, but at least he's trying to fire in the yorkers, and it's heaved along the ground through midwicket
lofted straight down the ground but not out of the middle, Pietersen has time to run around from long off
swing and a miss outside off...a whole over without a boundary, England tighten the screw
Mahmood is probably wishing he'd pulled a hamstring this morning, that's a thigh-high full toss which is dispatched high over midwicket
lofted through midwicket but the fielder can get to this one
almost tries to hit this too hard and mistimes it through square leg
pulled in the air out to deep midwicket, this is a good test for Pietersen's Achillies but he doesn't quite reach it...at least prevents a boundary
that one's a little tough on Mahmood, a pinpoint yorker and still Bosman squeezes it out down to third man
goes for a bouncer but fine leg is up and Bosman sends this one bounce down to the boundary
full outside off, slapped down to long off
effortless...as soon as Bosman hit that you knew it was out of the middle, he made it into a low full toss and connected magnificently over midwicket
this one finds the gap between long on and deep midwicket, not struck quite so well and he has to be content with four
fired in full and flat, driven hard back to the bowler who fields well
hoicks out to midwicket
worked down to long on...13 off the over which actually brings the run rate down a fraction
and he strikes with his first ball in international cricket as Smith picks out long on. Tried to go over his favourite area, but just got underneath it a little and finally a breakthrough
almost swings himself off his feet clubbing this one into midwicket
has a look at his first ball, tucked into the leg side
short outside off, a freebie for Morkel who cuts it away backward of point
nicely bowler, slightly quicker and hurries Morkel a little as he pushes into the off side
normal service resumed, brings out the slog sweep and although the deep fielder didn't have far to move he didn't have a chance of cutting it off
rank full toss, add one more to the sixes count as Bosman puts it over the deep square-leg boundary
comes round the wicket, fire across Bosman outside off and he digs it square on the off side
another full toss (I've lost count of how many) and I've nearly lost count of the sixes as well as this one goes gun-barrel straight towards the sight screen
what a catch...Bresnan at long on as pulled off an absolute blinder as Morkel doesn't quite get enough distance hitting into the wind. Bresnan timed his jump perfectly and plucked the ball
reverse sweep first ball, gets it fine through short third man
worked down to long on to end the over
driven firmly through the covers and long off runs around to field
huge! This one goes miles back over the the leg-side boundary, picked up the cutter from Anderson and connected with a free swing of the arms
good comeback, excellent yorker which Bosman can't get away
another prefect yorker, on off stump and squeezed into the off side
another high catch, this time to backward point as Duminy gets a thick outside edge trying to swing hard over the leg side
full ball driven down to long off
oh, what a shame for Bosman, another full toss but this time he doesn't get hold of it...the bat turned in his hand and Anderson makes good ground at deep midwicket to hold a fine catch
pushed down to long on
another good yorker, driven straight to cover
driven down the ground to long off
backs away to the leg side to give himself room and hammers the ball out to deep cover
thumping straight drive from Kallis, a low full toss that is rifled back past Wright's outstretched right hand
goes full first up, all de Villiers can do is drive to long off
a length ball is driven very correctly through the covers and de Villiers pushes Kallis to come back for two
finally something for Mahmood to enjoy, takes out off stump as Kallis misses a heave across the line...he might have taken some pace off that
and he's away straight away with a single to long on
skews away off a thick outside, third man is up inside the circle so it bobbles away over the boundary...Mahmood paid for bowling length again
ends with a dot ball, de Villiers plays over a wide yorker...so Mahmood avoids taking the most expensive T20 international figures
tries to sweep and gets a toe-end into the off side
well bowled, full on middle and it's dug down to long on...good running brings two
goodness me, de Villiers was down to sweep before the ball was let go and he ends up missing his shot...a version of Dilshan's scoop
well bowled, Bresnan saw de Villiers advancing and fired in a good bouncer
flies off the outside edge and goes over short third man
hammered down the ground, top shot, a clean swing through the line and it beats long off
driven hard down to long off

my word, that's an extraordinary shot, a flat-batted pull to a slower ball which goes straight down the ground and into the sight screen...de Villiers just managed to hold back on his shot long enough
swing and a miss outside off
swung through square leg, de Villiers chances coming back for a second but doesn't get close...no harm in trying at this stage
down the leg side, Anderson gets away with it as McLaren finds fine leg
low full toss heaved through midwicket, Kuhn races back for a second and with a dive makes it back
